title: "Microsoft cuts dozens of staff as it shifts to AI for MSN news stories"
excerpt: "Workforce automation is about to cost dozens of news contractors their jobs. The Seattle Times and The Guardian report that Microsoft is letting go of dozens of news contractors (about 50 in the US, 27 in the UK) after June 30th due to a shift to AI news production on MSN."
